label: Guerrero-Kommritz, Jürgen & Magdalena Blazewicz-Paszkowycz.  2004. New species of Tanaella Norman and Stebbing, 1886 (Crustacea: Tanaidacea: Tanaellidae) from the deep-sea off the Antarctic and the Angola Basin, with a key to the genus. Zootaxa 459: 1-20.
